statements: UPDATE experimental_results SET result_data = '{}';

UPDATE experimental_results SET researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';

UPDATE lab_settings SET temperature = 25.5 WHERE setting_id = 456;

UPDATE experimental_results SET experiment_description = 'Updated Experiment Description', start_time = '2022-09-30 12:00:00' WHERE experiment_id = 2;

UPDATE lab_technicians SET technician_role = 'Lead Technician' WHERE technician_id = 2002;
UPDATE laboratories SET lab_manager = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE lab_id = 3003;
UPDATE experimental_results SET result_value = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE experimenters SET job_title = 'Senior Scientist' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE lab_equipment SET location = 'Lab B' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE experimental_results SET result_value = result_value * 1.1 WHERE experiment_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE experimenters SET department = 'Research and Development' WHERE job_title = 'Scientist';
UPDATE lab_equipment SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE equipment_name = 'Microscope' AND location = 'Lab A';
